The Chief of Staff network has been incredibly helpful for me, and I honestly started seeing immediate value on Day 1 of joining. The network offers numerous opportunities to further growth, development, and camaraderie - I think it'd be challenging to navigate the CoS role alone without this group of people. Ali Sardinia Chief of Staff, Order.co Professional Membership Join our PRO Membership to unlock a world of opportunities designed specifically for Chiefs of Staff in startups. This exclusive membership provides access to: Career Development Specialized tools and materials to help you lead with confidence and efficiency and accelerate your development in the role. Tailored Networking Build meaningful connections with peers and industry leaders through exclusive events and real-time exchanges with hundreds of other Chiefs of Staff. Learn More Corporate Council Our Corporate Council is designed for Chiefs of Staff from large enterprises, providing a platform to enhance your strategic influence and leadership capabilities. Membership benefits include: Influence &Â Impact Leverage the collective wisdom of experienced professionals to drive strategic initiatives and contribute to your organizationâs success. Leadership Development: Engage in advanced training programs and workshops to refine your executive skills. Apply Now Learn More Praise from Members Here are a handful of testimonials from our satisfied members. The Chief of Staff Network has allowed me to build meaningful relationships with industry professionals, as well as learn from other Chiefs of Staff in a safe and productive space. Conor Sweeney Chief of Staff, Box The Chief of Staff Network has been an invaluable resource since the day I started the role. Through monthly sessions discussing CoS related topics, or just having a support group with shared experience, the community has been one of the centerpieces of my tenure as a Chief of Staff. Leland Chamlin Chief of Staff, Bowery Farming The Chief of Staff Network is the preeminent one-stop shop for impactful Chief of Staff resources, relationship building, and knowledge sharing. The talented members of this community provide invaluable job insights to one another, forging career-changing connections for years to come. Tyler Young Chief of Staff to the CFO, Braze The CoS Network brings a group of solution oriented minds together into an environment set up for collaboration and sharing of best practices. The role can be ambiguous and challenging- participating in this community of support means being able to share what you know and accelerate your impact as you lean on othersâ learnings. The experience has been an invaluable investment in my career. Mary Kate Sinha Chief of Staff at Plastiq This community has been a wonderful benefit to me personally as I've continued to grow in the role and coached others. Stephen Olmstead fmr VP, Chief of Staff at InVision This group is invaluable for anyone that wants to succeed at a scaling start-up in a Chief of Staff role. No matter what challenge is thrown at you in the role (and you will see it all), someone in the group has been through it and can provide great insight into how they tackled the issue. Mike Maseda Chief of Staff at Prompt I recently joined the Chief of Staff Network and have already made some amazing connections. When you're a chief of staff, you're often the only person in the company with that job title -- the COS Network has people in your shoes, and it's a great place for advice, brainstorming, and community. Highly recommend! David Burt Chief Of Staff at Atlantic Media The Chief of Staff Network has been a blessing as I ventured into a unique position that was new - not only for myself but also for SumUp. Having access to this community makes my life easier as weâre all facing similar challenges and can freely exchange on ideas and solutions. Jacques Hoerter Chief of Staff at SumUp I came across Chief of Staff Network when considering the CoS role for the first time and found the content about the role was so helpful, I immediately became a member when I officially started the position. The content and connections continued to be invaluable throughout my entire CoS journey, so much so that I was able to work myself out of the job and into a founder role faster than I anticipated. Highly recommend! Katie Murphy fmr Chief of Staff at HackerU Events Learn tactics from experts, brainstorm with peers, and grow your network by participating in our upcoming programs. All Events Sep 17 AI Opportunity Spotting: A Core Skill for Adaptive Leaders AI is everywhereâbut how do you actually see the opportunities that matter for your organization? This fast-paced session will help leaders sharpen the skill of spotting high-impact AI use cases across functions, moving from âwe know AI mattersâ to âwe know where it can move the needle.â
In this free session, youâll gain:
Strategic frameworks for evaluating AI use cases by ROI, feasibility, and readiness.
Real-world examples from peer organizations to cut through hype and focus on results.
A leadership lens for assessing opportunities across teamsânot just individual workflows.
Youâll leave with:
Clarity on where AI can drive early wins in your context.
A shared language to guide AI conversations with your leadership team Register Sep 19 Seattle Chief of Staff Meetup (Fri Sep 19) Join other strategic operators to talk shop, ask the hard questions, share your favorite media recommendations, and decompress from the week.

As AI reshapes the workplace, Chiefs of Staff must not only integrate new tools but also ensure that teams stay aligned, engaged, and adaptable in the face of rapid change. View all Career 5 Â min read Chief of Staff Job Description Checklist The Chief of Staff Job Description Checklist is a practical tool to help Chiefs of Staff quickly evaluate job postings and distinguish strategic, well-defined roles from vague or misaligned ones. Read more Resources 2 Â min read Chief of Staff Archetypes Framework Discover the Chief of Staff Archetypes & Shadows Framework, a practical tool for understanding the dynamics between Chiefs of Staff and their Principals. Explore six healthy archetypes, their shadow expressions, and strategies to expand your impact. Download the full framework or take the quiz to find your archetype. Read more Career 10 Â min read What Does a Chief of Staff Do? A Guide to the Most Versatile Role in Business This guide breaks down the evolving role of the Chief of Staff, one of the most versatile and strategic positions in modern organizations. It explores the core responsibilities of Chiefs of Staff ranging from strategic alignment and operational execution to communication management, while highlighting how digital transformation, AI, and hybrid work have expanded their scope. Drawing on real-world examples and frameworks, the article outlines the skills that set top Chiefs of Staff apart, the challenges they face, and why the future belongs to hybrid, tech-enabled operators who thrive in ambiguity and drive cross-functional impact. Read more Career 3 Â min read Why Now Is the Moment to Be a Chief of Staff AI is reshaping the Chief of Staff role. Learn why now is the moment to become an AI-native strategic operator before the window closes in 18 months. Read more Resources 3 Â min read A Different Approach to AI Adoption Three years into generative AI, many companies remain paralyzed by choice, unsure how to adopt AI tools effectively. Aaron Kalman, Chief of Staff at Lightrick argues that successful AI adoption requires a mindset shift: fostering bottom-up experimentation while signaling top-down intent. By removing barriers and encouraging teams to test, learn, and integrate AI tools into workflows, organizations can build a culture of rapid, meaningful AI adoption that drives productivity and long-term strategic advantage. Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park Ormond Beach Skip to content Home USA East Coast USA Cocoa Beach FL Daytona Beach FL New York City NY Orlando FL Central USA Las Vegas NV New Orleans LA West Coast USA Anaheim CA Portland OR Mexico Cancun MX Cenotes (Cancun) MX Mayan Ruins MX Los Cabos MX Caribbean Aruba Island Bahama Islands Jamaica Island Timeshare Promos Home USA East Coast USA Cocoa Beach FL Daytona Beach FL New York City NY Orlando FL Central USA Las Vegas NV New Orleans LA West Coast USA Anaheim CA Portland OR Mexico Cancun MX Cenotes (Cancun) MX Mayan Ruins MX Los Cabos MX Caribbean Aruba Island Bahama Islands Jamaica Island Timeshare Promos Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park Ormond Beach Stuff To Know About Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park: Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park is a beautiful and tranquil public park located in Ormond Beach, Florida. The park is situated on a 5-acre site that is surrounded by the Halifax River and offers visitors a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The park is home to a variety of natural and man-made attractions, including a butterfly garden, a rose garden, and a pond filled with koi fish. There are also several walking trails that wind through the park’s gardens, providing visitors with a chance to take in the park’s natural beauty. In addition to its gardens, Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park is also home to several historical buildings, including the Anderson-Price Memorial Building and the Casements Annex. These buildings offer visitors a glimpse into the area’s rich history and provide a unique backdrop for events and weddings. The park is open year-round and is free to the public. It is a popular destination for picnics, family outings, and wedding ceremonies, and offers a variety of amenities, including picnic tables, benches, and restrooms. Overall, Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park is a hidden gem in Ormond Beach and offers visitors a chance to experience the natural beauty of the area in a peaceful and serene setting. Whether you’re looking for a quiet place to relax or a beautiful location for a special event, Bailey Riverbridge Gardens Park is definitely worth a visit.
